channel.title: Studio: Spa User Validation :: C# Web Development
channel.description: We’ll build on the user-signup-starter studio from last class, adding in model validation. Getting Started Open up your SpaDay application and checkout the user-validation branch. Creating a New ViewModel To get started with adding validation to our application, we need to first make a ViewModel. After adding a folder for storing our ViewModels, create a new ViewModel for working with form submission called AddUserViewModel. Add properties for the user’s username, password, and email.
